descriptionMdByRank.1: When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, restores HP by **0.5%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 3s.
descriptionMdByRank.2: When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, restores HP by **0.65%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 3s.
descriptionMdByRank.3: When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, restores HP by **0.8%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 3s.
descriptionMdByRank.4: When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, restores HP by **0.95%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 3s.
descriptionMdByRank.5: When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, restores HP by **1.1%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 3s.
